'''Flying Bark Productions''' is an Australian entertainment and animation studio based in Sydney, that has been a subsidiary of the Belgian children's entertainment production company {{W|Studio 100}} since 2008. They are currently in the process of animating the upcoming ''[[Minecraft]]'' [[Minecraft Animated Series|animated series]] with [[WildBrain Studios]] for [[Netflix]].
